SEARCH

Class Obstacle

java.lang.Object
Entity
Obstacle
public class Obstacle extends Entity
Represents an Entity with additional value of size. Obstacle is a type of Entity that has a size. Extends the Entity class to inherit its name and Transform properties.
Version:
1.0
Author:
kbogott
See Also:

  • Transform
